name: Downhill Cycle Racer
description:
Downhill Cycle Racer is a game made by Masked Studio as a prototype to DCR Ultra. 

Try to reach the finish line before 30 seconds.

And try not to fall, but if you do, keeps going!

(You can either download the zip file or .exe file)

[DHR OR DCR are the two marks of the executable files by us]
